synopsis.text: Genta, Mitsuhiko, and Ayumi's look-alikes, Mayumi, Mikihiko, and Kenta, cross paths with Conan, Ran, Heiji, and Kazuha during a city tour in Osaka. The three children seek help from the young detectives to find their missing friend, Satoshi. As Conan and Heiji delve deeper into the case, they uncover a connection between Satoshi's disappearance and a robbery that took place earlier that day. With time running out, the group must solve the riddles left behind by Satoshi and apprehend the culprits before it's too late. Will they be able to find Satoshi and solve the mystery of the robbery? Join Conan and his friends in this thrilling adventure in Osaka!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
